description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Train Frontier, multiplayer train simulator, is a world building and train riding good time. Build an epic creation, then share it with your friends online through Xbox Live and ride together. Build it, share it, ride it, crash it, relax!
description.short: Train Frontier, multiplayer train simulator, is a world building and train riding good time. Build an epic creation, then share it with your friends online through Xbox Live and ride together. Build it, share it, ride it, crash it, relax!
